title: Opinions/Review about the Weekend Programme for Data Science and AI
content:
Hello Everyone! 

I am working Professional who has a experience of about 3 years and revelant experience of 2 years in the feild on Data Analytics, I am looking to upskill myself and pivot my career more into Data Science and ML because I believe in next 5-10 years the Data Analytics domain is going to be overly crowded and most of the things can be done by Saas tools 


I don't want to join a online class from upgrad or any other online companies because I find it bit of bogus hence I like the option provided by PES 

Can anyone among us give a feedback on the MTech programme offered by PES in Data Science and AI? Is it worth it?

comments.body:
well if you're actually interested in AI and want a job beyond just sanitizing data sets and wotnot, an Mtech and maybe PHD is pretty much mandatory

and yes, the ones at pes are pretty decent, theres hella expensive equipment thats easier to access than you would think
